answers.description: A cross-platform menu bar / system tray app that displays Clockwork Pro timer status and worklogs from Jira, with a Vercel backend proxy and Inngest-powered data sync.
answers.problem_statement: Users have to open Jira in a browser tab to check their Clockwork Pro timer status and worklogs, causing context-switching and friction in daily time tracking.
answers.target_users: Any Jira user with Clockwork Pro who wants a native desktop experience
key_goals: Provide real-time timer visibility in the menu bar
Enable timer start/stop without leaving the desktop
Show daily worklog summary at a glance
